message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.SI, cs.CY, cs.SD 

This paper deals with the automated classification of user comments in online journalism, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, it is likely to belong to the Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) and Information Retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. Additionally, the paper discusses the optimization and evaluation of multiple classifiers, which falls under the scope of Statistical Learning (cs.SI) and Cybernetics (cs.CY). Finally, the paper also touches upon the topic of social dynamics in online communities, which could be relevant to the Social and Information Networks (cs.SD) sub-category.
